SEARCH
Package model

Class PipeLine

java.lang.Object
model.PipeLine
public class PipeLine extends Object
The PipeLine class represents a pipe in the game Pipe Mania. Each pipe has a specific type that determines its shape and function in the game. Additionally, it contains references to adjacent pipes and methods for obtaining information about the pipe
